languages.text: "Одному удалось сбежать, так он такое рассказывает... там люди заживо гниют! Странные наросты, желтые глаза, запах как от трупов... самых запущенных отбирают и забирают... Этот сбежавший, он с виду был ничего, а через два дня, как повстанцы его подобрали, начал вместо людей чудовищ видеть. Его, бедолагу, заперли от людей, а он себе... вены..."

traits.locale_text: "Одному удалось сбежать, так он такое рассказывает... там люди заживо гниют! Странные наросты, желтые глаза, запах как от трупов... самых запущенных запирают в домах, которые потом жгут со всеми, кто внутри. Этот сбежавший, он с виды был ничего, а через два дня, как повстанцы его подобрали, начал вместо людей чудовищ видеть. Его, бедолагу, заперли от людей, а он себе... вены..."

languages.text: "One lad managed to get out — he's the one who told me all this... that the people are rotting alive in there! Strange growths, yellow eyes, stinking like dead bodies... The worst-looking ones are rounded up and taken away... The fellow who escaped, he seemed fine, but within a couple of days of the rebels picking him up, he started seeing monsters instead of people. They had to lock him up away from other folks, the poor sod, and then he... his wrists..."
languages.original_text: "Одному удалось сбежать, так он такое рассказывает... там люди заживо гниют! Странные наросты, желтые глаза, запах как от трупов... самых запущенных отбирают и забирают... Этот сбежавший, он с виду был ничего, а через два дня, как повстанцы его подобрали, начал вместо людей чудовищ видеть. Его, бедолагу, заперли от людей, а он себе... вены..."

"One lad managed to get out — he's the one who told me all this... that the people are rotting alive in there! Strange growths, yellow eyes, stinking like dead bodies... The worst-looking ones are rounded up and taken away... The fellow who escaped, he seemed fine, but within a couple of days of the rebels picking him up, he started seeing monsters instead of people. They had to lock him up away from other folks, the poor sod, and then he... his wrists..."

languages.text: 「どうにか逃げ出したやつが、事の次第を教えてくれた彼が言うには…そこの住民は生きながらにして腐るそうです！奇妙な腫瘍に、黄色い目、死体のような悪臭…。特に見た目がひどい者たちは、まとめて連れて行かれます…。逃げ出したやつ、この話をしてくれた彼は元気そうでしたが、反乱軍に捕らえられて2日もしないうちに、人ではなく怪物を見るようになったのです。反乱軍は他の仲間から隔離するために彼を幽閉し、かわいそうなことに、それから彼は…自分の手首を…」
languages.original_text: "One lad managed to get out — he's the one who told me all this... that the people are rotting alive in there! Strange growths, yellow eyes, stinking like dead bodies... The worst-looking ones are rounded up and taken away... The fellow who escaped, he seemed fine, but within a couple of days of the rebels picking him up, he started seeing monsters instead of people. They had to lock him up away from other folks, the poor sod, and then he... his wrists..."

traits.locale_text: 「どうにか逃げ出したやつが、事の次第を教えてくれた彼が言うには…そこの住民は生きながらにして腐るそうです！奇妙な腫瘍に、黄色い目、死体のような悪臭…。特に見た目がひどい者たちは、まとめて連れて行かれます…。逃げ出したやつ、この話をしてくれた彼は元気そうでしたが、反乱軍に捕らえられて2日もしないうちに、人ではなく怪物を見るようになったのです。反乱軍は他の仲間から隔離するために彼を幽閉し、かわいそうなことに、それから彼は…自分の手首を…」

languages.text: “有个小伙子想方设法逃了出来，就是他和我说了这些……说里面的人都在活活腐烂！他们长着古怪的增生物，眼睛发黄，像死人一样发臭……那些长得最难看的人随后就会被带走……那个逃出来的小伙子看起来好像没问题，但没过几天，起义军就把他带走了，因为在他眼里，所有人都变成了怪物。起义军不得不把他关起来，不让他靠近别人，那个可怜的小伙子。之后，他……他的手腕……”
languages.original_text: "One lad managed to get out — he's the one who told me all this... that the people are rotting alive in there! Strange growths, yellow eyes, stinking like dead bodies... The worst-looking ones are rounded up and taken away... The fellow who escaped, he seemed fine, but within a couple of days of the rebels picking him up, he started seeing monsters instead of people. They had to lock him up away from other folks, the poor sod, and then he... his wrists..."

traits.locale_text: “有个小伙子想方设法逃了出来，就是他和我说了这些……说里面的人都在活活腐烂！他们长着古怪的增生物，眼睛发黄，像死人一样发臭……那些长得最难看的人随后就会被带走……那个逃出来的小伙子看起来好像没问题，但没过几天，起义军就把他带走了，因为在他眼里，所有人都变成了怪物。起义军不得不把他关起来，不让他靠近别人，那个可怜的小伙子。之后，他……他的手腕……”

languages.text: «Un muchacho consiguió escapar; fue él quien me contó todo esto... ¡que la gente se pudre viva ahí dentro! Bultos inexplicables, ojos amarillentos, peste a cadáver... A los que tienen peor aspecto los reúnen y se los llevan... El que escapó parecía estar bien, pero, un par de días después de que los rebeldes lo acogieran, empezó a ver monstruos en lugar de personas. Tuvieron que encerrarle para proteger a los demás, pobrecillo, y entonces... sus muñecas...».
languages.original_text: "One lad managed to get out — he's the one who told me all this... that the people are rotting alive in there! Strange growths, yellow eyes, stinking like dead bodies... The worst-looking ones are rounded up and taken away... The fellow who escaped, he seemed fine, but within a couple of days of the rebels picking him up, he started seeing monsters instead of people. They had to lock him up away from other folks, the poor sod, and then he... his wrists..."

traits.locale_text: «Un muchacho consiguió escapar; fue él quien me contó todo esto... ¡que la gente se pudre viva ahí dentro! Bultos inexplicables, ojos amarillentos, peste a cadáver... A los que tienen peor aspecto los reúnen y se los llevan... El que escapó parecía estar bien, pero, un par de días después de que los rebeldes lo acogieran, empezó a ver monstruos en lugar de personas. Tuvieron que encerrarle para proteger a los demás, pobrecillo, y entonces... sus muñecas...».

languages.text: "Einem ist die Flucht gelungen – er hat mir das auch alles erzählt ... dass die Menschen dort bei lebendigem Leib verrotten! Seltsame Auswüchse, gelbe Augen, ein Gestank wie von Leichen ... Die im übelsten Zustand werden zusammengetrieben und fortgeschafft ... Der Geflohene wirkte ganz normal, aber einige Tage, nachdem die Rebellen ihn abgeholt hatten, sah er plötzlich überall Monster statt Menschen. Sie mussten ihn isoliert von anderen einsperren, den armen Kerl, und dann hat er ... seine Handgelenke ..."
languages.original_text: "One lad managed to get out — he's the one who told me all this... that the people are rotting alive in there! Strange growths, yellow eyes, stinking like dead bodies... The worst-looking ones are rounded up and taken away... The fellow who escaped, he seemed fine, but within a couple of days of the rebels picking him up, he started seeing monsters instead of people. They had to lock him up away from other folks, the poor sod, and then he... his wrists..."

traits.locale_text: "Einem ist die Flucht gelungen – er hat mir das auch alles erzählt ... dass die Menschen dort bei lebendigem Leib verrotten! Seltsame Auswüchse, gelbe Augen, ein Gestank wie von Leichen ... Die im übelsten Zustand werden zusammengetrieben und fortgeschafft ... Der Geflohene wirkte ganz normal, aber einige Tage, nachdem die Rebellen ihn abgeholt hatten, sah er plötzlich überall Monster statt Menschen. Sie mussten ihn isoliert von anderen einsperren, den armen Kerl, und dann hat er ... seine Handgelenke ..."

languages.text: « Une fois, un garçon a réussi à s'échapper. C'est lui qui m'a raconté tout ça... D'après lui, les gens pourrissent sur pied, là-bas ! Ils se couvrent d'étranges excroissances, leurs yeux deviennent jaunes et ils empestent comme des cadavres. Ceux dont l'état est le pire sont regroupés avant d'être emmenés... Ce garçon avait l'air en forme quand je l'ai vu, mais quelques jours après avoir été recueilli par les rebelles, il a commencé à prendre les gens pour des monstres. Ils ont dû l'enfermer à l'écart des autres, puis il... ses poignets... »
languages.original_text: "One lad managed to get out — he's the one who told me all this... that the people are rotting alive in there! Strange growths, yellow eyes, stinking like dead bodies... The worst-looking ones are rounded up and taken away... The fellow who escaped, he seemed fine, but within a couple of days of the rebels picking him up, he started seeing monsters instead of people. They had to lock him up away from other folks, the poor sod, and then he... his wrists..."

Ils se couvrent d'étranges excroissances, leurs yeux deviennent jaunes et ils empestent comme des cadavres. Ceux dont l'état est le pire sont regroupés avant d'être emmenés... Ce garçon avait l'air en forme quand je l'ai vu, mais quelques jours après avoir été recueilli par les rebelles, il a commencé à prendre les gens pour des monstres. Ils ont dû l'enfermer à l'écart des autres, puis il... ses poignets... »

languages.text: "Çıkmayı başaran bir çocuk vardı, bana bütün bunları o anlattı. İnsanlar canlı canlı çürüyormuş! Vücutlarında tuhaf şeyler büyüyor, gözleri sararıyor, ceset gibi kokuyorlarmış. En kötü görünenleri toplayıp götürüyorlarmış. Kaçan çocuk başta iyiymiş ama isyancılar onu aldıktan bir iki gün sonra insandan çok canavar görür olmuş. Onu diğerlerinden ayrı bir yere kapatmak zorunda kalmışlar. Zavallıcık. Sonra o... Bilekleri..."
languages.original_text: "One lad managed to get out — he's the one who told me all this... that the people are rotting alive in there! Strange growths, yellow eyes, stinking like dead bodies... The worst-looking ones are rounded up and taken away... The fellow who escaped, he seemed fine, but within a couple of days of the rebels picking him up, he started seeing monsters instead of people. They had to lock him up away from other folks, the poor sod, and then he... his wrists..."
